fire_golem.name: Fire Golem
fire_golem.description: A sturdy construct of living flame and stone, often found guarding volcanic passes. Its slow, deliberate steps belive its immense defensive capabilities.

undead_sorcerer.name: Undead Sorcerer
undead_sorcerer.description: A reanimated husk of a powerful mage, bound by dark magic. Its spells are chilling and its curses persistent.

shadow_warrior.name: Shadow Assassin
shadow_warrior.description: A master of stealth and dark magic, striking from the shadows with blinding speed and lethal precision. Few can withstand its sudden onslaught.

fallen_king.name: Ruined King Jarvan
fallen_king.description: A divine being of immense power and grace, a true legend. Once a beacon of light, now a harbinger of despair.

corrupted_angel.name: Lucifer, the Fallen
corrupted_angel.description: A once-divine being, strayed from the light into eternal darkness. Its presence warps reality, and its power is terrifying.

freya_the_mage.name: Freya the Mage
freya_the_mage.description: A powerful ice mage whose spells can freeze foes in their tracks. Her wisdom is as chilling as her magic.

gold_plated_wyvern.name: Gold-Plated Wyvern
gold_plated_wyvern.description: A rare and majestic wyvern adorned with shimmering golden scales, known for its blinding speed and valuable hoard. A true treasure of the skies.

ice_wyvern_juvenile.name: Ice Wyvern Juvenile
ice_wyvern_juvenile.description: A young ice wyvern, still learning to master its chilling breath and frozen scales. Despite its age, it poses a significant threat.

joan_of_arc.name: Joan of Arc
joan_of_arc.description: A legendary warrior and saint, her faith and courage inspire allies and strike fear into her enemies. She fights with unwavering conviction.

sword_maiden_amy.name: Sword Maiden Amy
sword_maiden_amy.description: A skilled and agile swordswoman, her blades move with fluid precision. She's known for her quick strikes and unwavering loyalty.

sword_maiden_kai.name: Sword Maiden Kai
sword_maiden_kai.description: A fierce and disciplined warrior, her swordsmanship is unmatched. She charges into battle with unwavering bravery, cutting down all who oppose her.

thunder_wyvern_juvenile.name: Thunder Wyvern Juvenile
thunder_wyvern_juvenile.description: A young thunder wyvern, crackling with raw electrical energy. Its speed in flight is only matched by the force of its lightning strikes.

leaf_wyvern_juvenile.name: Leaf Wyvern Juvenile
leaf_wyvern_juvenile.description: A young leaf wyvern, whose scales bear the vibrant hues of the deepest forest. It moves with a cunning agility that belies its draconic nature.

wind_wyvern_juvenile.name: Wind Wyvern Juvenile
wind_wyvern_juvenile.description: A young wind wyvern, a master of aerial maneuvers and swift currents. Its wings cut through the air with unmatched grace and speed.

fairy_queen.name: Fairy Queen Althea
fairy_queen.description: The regal ruler of the enchanted glades, her magic flows as freely as the forest streams. She embodies both beauty and formidable power.

ice_wyvern_adult.name: Ice Wyvern Adult
ice_wyvern_adult.description: A majestic ice wyvern, its scales glisten like frost. It commands the cold winds and can freeze its enemies with a single breath.

leaf_wyvern_adult.name: Leaf Wyvern Adult
leaf_wyvern_adult.description: A wise and ancient leaf wyvern, a true guardian of the deepest forests. Its movements are as silent as rustling leaves, and its attacks as sharp as thorns.

thunder_wyvern_adult.name: Thunder Wyvern Adult
thunder_wyvern_adult.description: An imposing adult thunder wyvern, its wings crackle with raw lightning. Its roars echo like thunder, and its strikes are as swift as a bolt from the sky.

wind_wyvern_adult.name: Wind Wyvern Adult
wind_wyvern_adult.description: An elusive adult wind wyvern, a master of the skies and swift currents. Its movements are a blur, and its gusts can rip through stone.

ice_wyvern_elder.name: Ice Wyvern Elder
ice_wyvern_elder.description: An ancient ice wyvern, its roar brings forth blizzards and its breath freezes mountains. Its wisdom is as profound as the glaciers it calls home.

leaf_wyvern_elder.name: Leaf Wyvern Elder
leaf_wyvern_elder.description: A primordial leaf wyvern, a silent guardian of the ancient forests. Its connection to nature grants it unparalleled agility and restorative powers.

thunder_wyvern_prince.name: Thunder Wyvern Prince
thunder_wyvern_prince.description: A formidable thunder wyvern of royal lineage, crackling with untamed electrical might. Its presence electrifies the air, and its storms devastate all in their path.

wind_wyvern_elder.name: Wind Wyvern Elder
wind_wyvern_elder.description: An ancient wind wyvern, its wisdom is vast as the sky. It controls the currents, weaving illusions and striking with unseen force.

enlightened_angel.name: Kayle, the Awakened
enlightened_angel.description: A being from beyond comprehension, its mere presence warps reality. A beacon of celestial light, its justice is swift and absolute.

thunder_dragon_lord.name: Thunder Dragon Lord
thunder_dragon_lord.description: The undisputed sovereign of storms, its power can shatter mountains and ignite the skies. Its very roar brings forth cataclysms.

leaf_wyvern_hatchling.name: Leaf Wyvern Hatchling
leaf_wyvern_hatchling.description: A young leaf wyvern, still learning to harness its connection to nature. Its scales shimmer with the colors of the forest, and it moves with a cunning agility.

untamed_wyvern.name: Untamed Wyvern
untamed_wyvern.description: A wild and ferocious wyvern, untamed by any master. Its scales are a patchwork of colors, and its roar can shake the very earth.
